## Description
The Lander Hab is a jack-of-all-trades building that houses many basic but critical functions&#10;to jump start a settlement. It&#39;s commonly used as a main hub.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Category:|Command|
|Construction:|PRE_FABRICATED|
|Size:|9.0 x 9.0 m|
|Level:|1|
|Maintenance Period:|250|
|Power Demands:|3.0 kW|
|Offline Power Demands:|0.3 kW|
|Construction:|[Lander Hab](/docs/definitions/construction/lander-hab)|
